class.name: VisualShaderNodeVectorRefract
class.brief_description: Returns the vector that points in the direction of refraction. For use within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Translated to [code]refract(I, N, eta)[/code] in the shader language, where [code]I[/code] is the incident vector, [code]N[/code] is the normal vector and [code]eta[/code] is the ratio of the indices of the refraction.
